author: vanbesien
body:
Replacement for #11159 
The PR #11159 in its current form seems to reveal some bugs that have been there for a while.
Namely, it creates 3 empty histograms in the root folder of the histogram hierarchy, which looks quite strange in the GUI and are very visible.
This is caused by booking histograms before setting the folder.
The primary case was [L1TGT.cc#L42](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_7_4_X/DQM/L1TMonitor/src/L1TGT.cc#L42)
But we found out that many of the modules contain monitor elements:
- runId_
- eventId_
- runStartTimeStamp_
- lumisecId_

that are
- either booked before folder was chosen
- or otherwise booked correctly, but never filled
- or just variables declared, but never used

We cleaned this up in the final commit of this PR.
title: PR11159 and l1t bugfix folderless histos
